sentences.en: At room temperature, the thermal conductivity of a diamond is about six times higher than that of a piece of copper.
sentences.cn: 在室温下, 钻石的热传导律比铜块高六倍左右.

sentences.en: At the same time, we discussed the conductivity mobility spectrum analysis method.
sentences.cn: 同时对电导率迁移率谱这一实验方法也做了较详细的说明.

sentences.en: Determination of conductivity in low temperature is very important on organ cryopreservation.
sentences.cn: 低温下导热系数测定对生物器官的低温保存很重要.

sentences.en: If the electrical conductivity is high enough the field becomes " frozen " into the plasma.
sentences.cn: 如果电导率足够高,磁场就 “ 冻结 ” 在等离子中.

sentences.en: In heterogeneous anisotropic materials the heat flow vector and conductivity are more complex.
sentences.cn: 在各向异性的非均质材料中,热流向量和热导率很复杂.

sentences.en: It is insulator but its thermal conductivity is better than Cu.
sentences.cn: 它本身是绝缘体,其导热能力优于铜,并能承受极高的强电场.

sentences.en: It is not possible to name any particular conductivity at which metals end and semiconductors begin.
sentences.cn: 不可能说出在哪个特定的导电系数处是金属和半导体的分界.

sentences.en: It possesses incredible strength and elasticity, while its exceptionally high conductivity and use in flexible semiconductors  could soup up computing.
sentences.cn: 它具有难以置信的强度和弹性，而其异常的高导电性和半导体中灵活的应用可以提高计算能力。

sentences.en: Many plastics have high surface resistance and low electrical conductivity.
sentences.cn: 很多塑料具有高的表面电阻和低的导电性能.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the correlation between freezingpoint osmotic pressure and conductivity.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨在肾病检查中尿液冰点渗透压和尿液电导率的相关关系.

sentences.en: Only when the total volume of filler increases, the conductivity then increases.
sentences.cn: 只有当填料总的体积含量显著增加时, 导电性才能进一步提高.

sentences.en: Operating on the borderline of superconductivity and ordinary conductivity, they produce immense amplification.
sentences.cn: 它们在超导性和普通导电性的临界线上操作, 产生巨大的放大效果.

sentences.en: Sometimes the carbon rods are copper coated to improve electrical conductivity.
sentences.cn: 有时这些碳棒包上一层铜,以增加其导电性.

sentences.en: The conductor is reluctant to reduce the conductivity of the semiconductor.
sentences.cn: 导演不情愿降低半导体的导电率。

sentences.en: The existence of the contact resistance must be considered when accurate thermal conductivity measurements are performed.
sentences.cn: 如果要精确地测量热导率,就必需考虑接触阻力的存在问题.

sentences.en: Thermal conductivity varies for different gases.
sentences.cn: 热传导率因不同气体而异.

sentences.en: They discovered a first order phase transition, a discontinuity, in liquid hydrogen between a molecular state with low conductivity and a highly conductive atomic state.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了一个不连续的一级相变，这个相变是在液态氢低电导率的分子态和高电导率的原子态之间。

words.tran_cn: 传导的；传导性的；有传导力的
导体；售票员；领导者；管理人
女向导；女车长；女指挥；女售票员

phrases.tran_cn: 高导电率；离导电率；高电导性
渗透系数；导水率；液压传导率；水力传导率
离子电导率；离子电导性
